property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I serve only justice. But through that duty, I serve all of Ravnica."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Herald can't be blocked. When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As peace should be - gentle yet unstoppable." - Augustin IV

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying When Stoic Ephemera blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is fleeting, and so is death. Only the oath is eternal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, then put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When Court Hussar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {W} was spent to cast it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As whispers and rumors increased, so did the demand for fail-safe barriers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Archon of the Triumvirate attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. • Draw a card. • Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}: Tap target creature. {2}{U}: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Detention Sphere enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent not named Detention Sphere and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent. When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({WU} can be paid with either {W} or {U}.) Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell. That player creates X 1/1 white and blue Bird creature tokens with flying, where X is the spell's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never thought I'd be so glad to see two tons of beak and claws bearing down on me at the speed of an arrow." - Mirela, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Isperia the Inscrutable deals combat damage to a player, choose a card name. That player reveals their hand. If a card with the chosen name is revealed this way, search your library for a creature card with flying, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It misses nothing and it has no sense of humor." - Barvisa, courtroom scribe

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red When Lavinia of the Tenth enters the battlefield, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with mana value 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Lyev Skyknight enters the battlefield, detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Pride of the Clouds gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield with flying. Forecast - {2}{W}{U}, Reveal Pride of the Clouds from your hand: Create a 1/1 white and blue Bird creature token with flying. (Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller can't cast spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have confiscated your spells as evidence. Once we conclude our investigation, you may petition to have them returned."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sky Hussar enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control. Forecast - Tap two untapped white and/or blue creatures you control, Reveal Sky Hussar from your hand: Draw a card. (Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Skymark Roc attacks, you may return target creature defending player controls with toughness 2 or less to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try not to look guilty. Or delicious." - Thorpe, street urchin

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn. {U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {W}{U}: Azorius Keyrune becomes a 2/2 white and blue Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The higher the mind soars, the greater its understanding of the law." - Isperia

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law - strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice three white creatures: Exile target creature. Whenever another black creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Spend your life betraying me if you wish. I'll simply take it up with your ghost."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Belfry Spirit enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature can't attack this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists hanged her for sport in the township square. Her ghost now stands vigil at what has become known as the Tree of Weeping.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies." - Savra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Other creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skeletal Vampire enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let him be an example to others who would default on their debts to us." - "The Cozen," Orzhov assassin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of Despair enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Deathpact Angel dies, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({WB} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One moment, conscious only of a sense of repose. The next moment, hearing the trudge of his own footsteps. He sighed and squinted into the glare ahead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ghost Council of Orzhova enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile Ghost Council of Orzhova. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand. • Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness. • Return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Orzhov Pontiff enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, choose one - • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. • Creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is worse - the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn. {1}{W}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You can't cast this spell unless an opponent lost life this turn. Flying, trample Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, each player puts a creature card with mana value 3 or less from their graveyard onto the battlefield. When Crypt Champion enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {R} was spent to cast it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to any target. Hellbent - Cackling Flames deals 5 damage instead if you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like a little entertainment with my dinner." - Rakdos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Demonfire deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Hellbent - If you have no cards in hand, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn. {R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Hellbent - Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!" - Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({BR} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Flying When Avatar of Discord enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Such is the power of Rakdos that even his shadow takes on a cruel life of its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, haste Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its favorite treats are candied hands and sweet hearts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Jagged Poppet is dealt damage, discard that many cards. Hellbent - Whenever Jagged Poppet deals combat damage to a player, if you have no cards in hand, that player discards cards equal to the damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Lyzolda, the Blood Witch deals 2 damage to any target if the sacrificed creature was red. Draw a card if the sacrificed creature was black.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sacrificial rites take place before an audience of cheering cultists, each begging to be the next on stage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, deathtouch Master of Cruelties can only attack alone. Whenever Master of Cruelties attacks a player and isn't blocked, that player's life total becomes 1. Master of Cruelties assigns no combat damage this combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Exile target player's graveyard. • Destroy target artifact. • Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({BR} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) {3}{B}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {3}{R}: Create a 2/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever Rakdos the Defiler attacks, sacrifice half the non-Demon permanents you control, rounded up. Whenever Rakdos deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices half the non-Demon permanents they control, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos's Return deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Lord Rakdos stirred from his slumber, everyone else's nightmare began.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({BR} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most auramancers would have let the spikes hover just above the skin. Having the spikes rip through the skin from beneath was a touch added by Rakdos himself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos festivals almost leave enough rubble in their wake to hide the bodies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {B}{R}: Rakdos Keyrune becomes a 3/1 black and red Devil artifact creature with first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rakdos use it for everything you can think of and plenty more than that.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying {R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total mana value 6 or less, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Creatures with power less than Skarrgan Pit-Skulk's power can't block it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Bloodrush - {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gruul embrace all things poisonous and living in the cracks of society." - Teysa Karlov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant green creature Enchanted creature gets +6/+6. {G}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Wurmweaver Coil: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some use magic to spy through walls. Others use it to crush them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Borborygmos deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy to see why those Gruul dirtbags follow him - the only orders he gives are ‘Crush them!' and ‘We eat!'" - Teysa Karlov

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul shamans are bent on punishing the civilized. Any act more complex than rubbing sticks together or eating with utensils is met with the stinging burn of their magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Bloodrush - {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?" - Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({RG} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.) Trample; haste; shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We respect all lifeforms, but this one we respect from a distance." - Mandor, Selesnya ranger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures without flying can't block this turn. • Gain control of all permanents you own. • Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the coins in Ravnica can't save his soul now." - Narbulg Nine Fingers

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This city will perish, and the Gruul will cheer as the boar-god crushes the last bricks into dust." - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example." - Trigori, Azorius senator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{RG}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They inflict pain to forget their own and break foes to feel whole.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one - • Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature. • Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. Whenever you tap Zhur-Taa Druid for mana, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the decadent think magic should be pristine and without cost."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gurley was the first to domesticate one, though his widow didn't take much solace in that accomplishment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped. When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Zegana, Utopian Speaker enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card. {4}{G}{U}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome." - Speaker Trifon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}: Add {G} for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Vinelasher Kudzu.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elusive Krasis can't be blocked. Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Experiment Kraj has all activated abilities of each other creature with a +1/+1 counter on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course it will grow beyond control - it was designed to choose its own evolution." - Momir Vig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature becomes a Frog with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature has hyperevolved chameleonic abilities. It no longer mimics its surroundings, instead forcing them to take on its form." - Simic research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {2}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Progenitor Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature isn't a token, create a token that's a copy of this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design." - Momir Vig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Held aloft by metabolized magic, trygons are ravenous for sources of mystic fuel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is technically an ooze, but its lifespan measures only seconds. In that short time, its appetite for magic is extraordinary." - Simic research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{U}, {T}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to hurl rocks and eat scraps of meat burned over a fire. Look at what I've become and tell me Simic does not hold infinite possibility."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped. When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{U}.
